abstract: Jakob Bendix Uhd Poulsen (born 7 July 1983) is a Danish professional football player in the midfielder position, playing for Midtjylland. Poulsen started his senior career with Esbjerg fB, before moving to Dutch side SC Heerenveen in 2006. He joined AGF Aarhus in the summer of 2008. He has played 27 games and scored one goal for the Denmark national football team.
